title: Person of Interest | Elias and Scarface - Way Down We Go
author: Real Scorsese
comment: God I miss this show so much. Excellent vid! Thank you so much! I miss my crime husbands
Thanks again for your help on twitter. I could watched it at last and I'm loving it!! Very well-done :)
Great video. Thx for reminding me best character of All times.
those of you who make these videos have so much talent
Somehow I never commented here... ehm... AWESOME video :) The second part (after 1:14) is just a bomb ^_^
description:
If the video shows unavailable on your smartphone, try it from a computer.

For Enrico and David : 
I loved your Duet in the series, it was important for me to pay tribute to you two !

Montage video by me
Song : Barns Courtney - Glitter And Gold [Official Audio]
Song #2 : Kaleo - Way Down We Go
